item.title: Prawn ruby marking stamp at page center
item.description:
Problem - Prawn

We have to put a default text on every page center if we’re not able to insert image at it’s bounding box.

Sample Usage

define a stamp :-

{% highlight ruby %} prawn_pdf.create_stamp(“stamp”) { prawn_page.fill_color ‘#4a8bc2’ prawn_page.text_box ‘[Image not available.]‘, :width => bounds.width, :height => bounds.height, :align => :center, :valign => :center, :at => [0, bounds.height], :rotate => 45, :rotate_around => :center } {% endhighlight %}

mark stamp at any page by just calling it by name :-

prawn_page.stamp("stamp")

Things to take care

  • stamp name should be unique.
  • should be take care of stamp dimension and its content.
